comment.author: 67307569@N00
comment._content: The local terrain must have been very muddy - note the trench waders on the standing soldier.

comment.author: 8492043@N07
comment._content: Rather than this fanciful and inappropriate stuff about soldiers with "cocky" grins "jammed" somewhere, some factual info would be useful -- location, regiment, ranks, etc. What does MGC stand for, is it machine gun corps? What's the joke about "corner house", is it anything to do with Lyon's Corner Houses? They were quite new at the time.
